author: bimargulies
msg: Clarify perhaps role of comdev mailing list as focus of participation.

author: marvin
msg: LUCY-243 Warn when file deletion fails.
*   Use the return value of remove() to determine success/failure
*   Warn if it cannot be guaranteed that the file is gone.
*   Wrap all file removals from the Charmonizer core in
This commit requires ENOENT which is POSIX not C89 but should work for

author: hibou
msg: Fixing tests: when trying to convert an url to a file, try first new File(new URI(url.toExternalForm())), then new File(url.getPath())
